decked-out-obs.message.server_started: Decked Out Server started on port %d
decked-out-obs.message.obs_source: Your OBS Browser Source url is %s
decked-out-obs.message.calibration_faile: Could not determine the dungeon layout. Are you setting the correct barrel?

decked-out-obs.message.port_in_use: Port %d is already in use, choose another one
decked-out-obs.system.changing_ports: Changing ports from %d to %d, stopping the server.
